content: GPT-5.2 is a powerful AI model, as indicated by its title "GPT-5.2 is a total monster."
Users can try Skywork for free and receive a 20% discount using the code AISEARCH.
A limited-time offer provides a 33% discount on Skywork, reducing the annual cost to $99.99, valid until January 5 (UTC).
OpenAI has introduced GPT-5.2, with details available on their official blog.

GPT-5.2 is capable of various advanced tasks, including beehive simulation, Photoshop cloning, image-to-3D model conversion, Windows and MS Office cloning, night sky viewing, anime character labeling, object finding (e.g., Waldo), table-to-spreadsheet conversion, flowchart image-to-HTML conversion, camouflage testing, medical scan analysis, and geoguessing.
